description:
Speaker: Christian Barra

Track:PyConDE
`Kubernetes (K8s) is an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.`

During this training you will learn how to use it and how it can help as a Python developer.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference.
https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/D8VAN9
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pydataberlin
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pyconde
title: Tutorial: Kubernetes 101 for Python Developers
